devcon-issuer-email.name: Devon Ticket Issuer (with email)
devcon-issuer-email.description: Ticket Issuer website example, where token attestations are sent to an email address in the form of a magic link.

devcon-issuer-url.name: Devon Ticket Issuer (with url)
devcon-issuer-url.description: Ticket Issuer website example, where token attestations are are generated inside the website.

hotel-bogota-passive.name: Hotel Bogota (Passive Negotiation)
hotel-bogota-passive.description: Token Negotiator with passive configuration, where all tokens are learnt by the hotel to apply discounts

hotel-bogota-active.name: Hotel Bogota (Active Negotiation)
hotel-bogota-active.description: Token Negotiator with active configuration, where the end user can choose which tokens the hotel should learn to gain discounts.

hello-world-store.name: Hello World Store (OnChain Active Negotiation)
hello-world-store.description: Token Negotiator with active configuration, where the end user can choose which tokens the hotel should learn to gain discounts.

liscon.name: Liscon (Passive Negotiation)
liscon.description: Solution delivered for Liscon, with creation of off chain token attestations that can be minted on chain.
